body.gathalast: Cittassa damatho sādhu, cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
Cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvī, cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
body.gatha1: Kumbhūpamaṃ kāyamimaṃ viditvā, nagarūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ ṭhapetvā;
body.gathalast: Yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhena, jitañca rakkhe anivesano siyā.
body.gatha1: Diso disaṃ yaṃ taṃ kayirā, verī vā pana verinaṃ;
Na taṃ mātā pitā kayirā, aññe vāpi ca ñātakā;
body.gathalast: Sammāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, seyyaso naṃ tato kare.
